text: Jakob Blasel (born 16 October 2000) is a German climate activist. He is from Schleswig-Holstein, and is an initiator of the school strike for climate in Northern Germany. In May 2019, Blasel addressed the ESA's Living Planet Symposium in Milan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:2000 births Category:21st-century German people Category:Climate activists Category:Climate change environmentalists Category:German environmentalists Category:People from Schleswig-Holstein Category:Youth activists
title: Jakob Blasel
